CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that colors are not re-formatted inside url(...) when editing property values.

rgb(255, 255, 255)
url( white )
url(white.png)
url(../foo/white.png)
rgb(0, 128, 0) url(white)
url(white) rgb(0, 128, 0)
url(white) green, url(green)
url(white), url(green)
rgb(191, 64, 64) url(white)
url(white) rgb(191, 64, 64)
url(../black/white.png)
